website_summaries.verdict: A compact fire pit table that fits most yards and offers serious heat output, all for a budget-friendly price.
pros: Made of durable steel that won’t crack or warp
Includes a metal cover for the fire pit when it’s not in use
cons: Occasional complaints of dented pieces in the box

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/Easy off
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered the colored glass, because the lava rocks are hideous! Assembly was a tough start because the instructions aren't the best. But I was able to figure it out. It's a beautiful piece and I have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this.. a little hard to assemble, but got it supper quick , great size .. just perfect see pics!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hayes

customer_reviews.title: IT’S LIT!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found a fire-pit I liked better after this one had already shipped. I reached out to the seller and they were super friendly and accommodating. I decided to stick with it and I’m so glad I did! It was simple and quick (<30 minutes) to put together. All the parts were present and labeled and all the pre-drilled holes lined up perfectly. We did not run into any issues. No line leaks and lit on the first try. I bought the blue glass rocks separately. I am so in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BNG

customer_reviews.title: Held 20 lbs of the glass stone
customer_reviews.text: Love this Fire Pit...Has a cover for the stones whereas some do not. We did order separately a cover to completely cover when not in use or heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After assembling was completed I turned the fire pit right side up to discover it had a dent and scratches on the table top. Otherwise everything else looks and works fine. A customer service rep contacted me the next day to help resolve my damage complaint. Since the dent was not affecting the functionality of the fire table the vendor refunded me a portion of the price I paid. Needless to say I way very happy how this company handled my complaint and was quickly resolved. Hence the 5 star review. Even with the small dent I love my fire table. Easy to put together and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Graybeard

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this fire table!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love our fire pit table. It was exactly what I expected and as described. It was easy to assemble, even easier with two people. It has a very classy look, solid construction, not flimsy at all. It looks great with our other patio furniture. We got many compliments from our family about how gorgeous it is. Great heat coming from it. So far it is working nicely. I am pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not working - ignition failure
customer_reviews.text: Spent Saturday afternoon putting the thing together. Assembly is painstaking, and instructions sometimes left us needing more specifics. Lava rocks are scant and not attractive. Once we got it all put together, now it won't ignite. We aren't gas specialists - where in the heck do you "adjust the distance between the electrode ignition pin and flame orifice?" Company support isn't available on weekends, of course. We'll call the phone given when Monday comes - I"ll update the review when the matter concludes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fire pit, never worked
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Hasn’t worked since day one and the company is ignoring our messages.
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit is great looking, easy to install. It's a bummer that the ignition switch is not working, hence rendering the unit useless and a fancy entertainment table !!! Note - on further inspection , the gas hose was melted and stuck on arrival making it extremely dangerous. Please watch out. Tacklife, PLEASE have some quality controls, it will be a pain to disassemble and return back. Contacted seller to know how I can make it work. I
customer_reviews.author: Shopppie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a dent in the lid, I emailed the company and asked for a replacement, did not get a reply. The ignition is sporadic at best; takes multiple attempts and you have to use a lighter, the auto ignite doesn’t work at all. I emailed the company again asking for a return and still got no response. I am not at all pleased and would not recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: You’ll Be Sorry If You Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fire pit—— until I didn’t! My fire pit stopped working after the SECOND use. It won’t light anymore . I’ve contacted the seller and nothing . The knob just twists and clicks but nothing is igniting. I looked at other reviews and tried lighting with a lighter ...nothing. I’m a single woman and have no idea how to go about fixing this issue- but at $200 I SHOULDNT HAVE TOO! The worst experience I’ve ever had using Amazon. They should rescind this sellers business account as the item is faulty..... and it arrived late!
customer_reviews.author: K. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!! It is cheaply made and the screws don’t even match up!! So disappointed!! I want a refund!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GLB311

customer_reviews.title: Will not Ignite
customer_reviews.text: The product will not ignite. We followed the instructions. I sent an email to the seller and am waiting to hear back on either a replacement or refund. Will update review once we receive a response.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.  Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and functionality of the table which is to be used on our back deck that is covered. Was not the easiest to assemble as some screw holes were stripped. When fully assembled we tried to light and the ignition switch doesn’t light. You have to manually light with a lighter on top instead of with the switch. Wouldn’t recommend for this alone. I’ll let you know how customer service goes with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Makes our deck like a spa!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just before the shelter in place! Boy it makes our deck into a little paradise! Best $160 I’ve ever spent. The assembly is lengthy but it had the best instructions and labels I’ve ever seen. Took about a hour with help. Lots of screw driving. It is finicky to start 1/10 times. But just use a lighter. At full blast it uses a full tank in about 6-8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: No hardware and cannot assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The Fire Pit product came without hardware. I could not assemble it. Have been emailing back and forth to try to get the hardware. As of this review, still no hardware. May get it eventually, but in the meantime the fire pit is still in the box and I cannot use it. Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value But Has Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for money. Not easy to put together. Use hand tools and don’t force the screws. They should screw in rather easily once you get them aligned. Don’t use power tools. Igniter doesn’t work well. I have to match light. That’s a major disappointment. Several other reviews indicated same issue.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyepetey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work  No response from shipper???
customer_reviews.text: Unable to light it, no spark. Tried to call for support, Phone number listed has been disconnected. Put in an Amazon request to return it, no answer. Very long 6 weeks wait from China. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Greek

customer_reviews.title: Love it after installation.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great fire pit table. It keeps us really warm unlike others we saw. Size is perfect and fits right in any tight or larger place. My only complain is installation instructions wasn't clear and took us very long time to install and still its weirdly installed, I mean the propane sits in the back rather than in the front inside the fit and makes it difficult to open and close. Other than that it works great and perfectly does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Bhoot

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, good value
customer_reviews.text: I had a low gas powered fire pit. However, after 2 winters it began to crack an large sections of the fiberglass and fake stone started falling off. I also had a dog that liked to play with the lava rocks. So, when the old one died, I wanted something a bit higher and made better. This fit the bill. Because it is higher, the heat starts out higher but it still puts out a fair amount of heat. Plus, it is up off the ground to keep the dog out. So far, it starts every time and is esthetically pleasing. \
customer_reviews.author: ALAN G

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I hate putting things together. I long for the day when you purchased complete items. Alas. But that said, it wasn’t bad to assemble. I hauled it out under my tree for shade and with the assistance of my 72 year old mother, we assembled. The finished product is lovely. Note- At first, the flame didn’t stay lit. After a couple of minutes, maybe as the gas built up? IDK, but after a few minutes it stayed lit and was a decent flame. It put out some decent heat.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sturdy fire table for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, but we were missing one piece for a screw to connect the tank brace to the table leg. Was able to fit it in to hold the parts together, but will need to be secured somehow...The ignitor does not spark at all - was finally able to light it with a lighter. Took a while for the line to open up when it was connected to the propane tank, but disconnecting it and connecting it again TIGHTLY seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Michele O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work. :(
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to like. It won’t start. I’m going to see if someone else might have better luck. But as of now, I’m really disappointed. AND to make it worse, The contact number shown on the manual is disconnected! Now I’m starting to think this is a scam! Ugh! UPDATE: My friend got it to work, but only using a lighter. Having to use a lighter is not what paid for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love the fire pit table, best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I just love this fire pit table. Customer service is top notch, seller is awesome had a problem they took care of it ASAP!!! We can’t get enough compliments from all the neighbors. This was out first day/ evening with it had a hiccup lighting took two clicks, but poof it’s on. I would buy again from this seller. We added celestial fire glass and will be getting the tempered fire glass screen for safety. It puts out a tremendous amount of heat and flames get crazy when the wind blows. So hopefully the glass flame guard will prevent the dog from becoming a hotdog...we love this fire table!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise the weight of this pit is impressive. It certainly won’t blow around on my deck in a wind storm. All parts were there in addition to extra screws. Everything is pre drilled and fits as directed in the assembly directions. Follow the steps in order! Lighting the fire in the pit required careful reading of the instructions for me. It was similar to lighting my hot water tank in that I needed to hold in the knob after initial ignition and then turn to the flame level I desired. Needed to rearrange the stones so as not to block the gas openings on the ring. Very pleased with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Oubre

customer_reviews.title: On missing step in the directions
customer_reviews.text: At first the ignite didn’t seem to work, but after customer service (email option only), they advised to allow the gas to flow for 3-5 seconds before following the regular ignite instructions. Mostly happy with the product now.
customer_reviews.author: justme101

customer_reviews.title: Great table for all spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a firetable for awhile now, and love that this option was so affordable compared to the larger, more ornate tables. When it is lit it really does put out a decent amount of heat - I got it in summer but am excited to really put it to use on some crisp fall mornings / evenings! I took away one star just because I agree with so many other reviews - it is a challenge to light. My husband thought I was just doing it wrong (following directions) but he could not get it as easily either. Still a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, have your fire going w/in 30mins
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, took my husband 20mins. It’s pretty sturdy especially after you put in the propane tank. Only thing it doesn’t come with adjustable levelers to level it out on your patio. The photos are the lowest and highest setting the flame will go. Hope this helps. Great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ama-mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, looks great,  dont buy from this guy
customer_reviews.text: Took a month to get this after the vendor told me it had shipped. Fed Ex said nada. After a few emails and a month layer it came. No damage but it did not have the cover that was suppose to come with this one. Some do and some dont, mine was suppose to have a cover. Went together no problem, we ise glass rocks in it. You need a 20lb or equivalent. Looks great at night. It will not replace a wood burning pit on colder nights. But low 60’s so far and we love it. Stay away from this seller. I want my cover
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this table! Watch the instructional video to build, before reading the manual
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a propane table and now I have the yard to have one! The table was shipped timely, delivered well-packaged. The instructions were good, I wished I watched the instructional video first though- I think that would've saved me some time. None the less, the table works GREAT. Easy to put together, nice looking, good distribution of fire, sturdy, and I am super proud of my new table!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasn't too difficult. Looks nice and sturdy. Lights right up, no problem! I think some are having difficulty with the igniter because you need to turn and continue to hold the knob in for about 15 seconds after fire is lit in order for it to stay lit. Then after about 15 seconds stop pushing the knob in and turn to adjust the level of the flame. We have not had any issues with ours except one time after it rained and the rocks got wet, once dry, no problem. Very nice addition to our patio!
customer_reviews.author: chomper

customer_reviews.title: Shipping time was entirely too long.
customer_reviews.text: Took exactly 1 month to arrive!!! That is insane. After putting it together the product is decent, and I bought the blue glass rocks as well like the others commented. They look fantastic. Time will tell how durable this is, it does seem slightly “Flemsy”... If it had come on time or at least updated me on the shipping details I would have rated higher.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this firepit! It look beautiful, puts off a good amount of heat, and the table feature is convenient. My only complaint is that it rusts easily. I just bought a cover and haven't had an issue since. Oh and if anyone is wondering...It came with lava rocks not the blue rocks that are pictured. Here's the link for the rocks I bought. I love how the combination turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Good heat, lasts a long time, no more smoke in your face!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this around Christmas time when it was on sale. It arrived safely and on time which is always a good thing. Assembly was kind of a pain due to poor instructions. But it was simple enough... you can pretty easily piece the thing together if you are handy. It took me 20-30 mins to build. I purchased blue fire rocks to give off a cool vibe. I use mine almost every night! It gives off great heat and lasts a long time! I’d recommend refilling your propane at Costco (it’s really cheap like $5 a tank) I love this purchase and would recommend to anyone interested. No more Smokey yard fires for me!
customer_reviews.author: kork

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice materials, puts out great heat!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fire pit, looked for a few months and read reviews extensively. Easy to put together and follow instructions, took my husband and I about an hour. Love how much heat it puts out, the height of the flames the look and feel of materials is sturdy and high-quality. We’ve had a fire almost every night in the backyard and it just makes the environment so relaxing and enjoyable. Really nice lid/cover for when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service; very satisfied with the product so far. The company had a delay in shipping and responded in a customer-centered way to make it up to me. Product finally arrived and was easy, if time consuming, to assemble. The only problem is the door (opening to access the tank) - the panel is flimsy and the hinges are lopsided so the door doesn’t hang straight and catches when opened or closed. Just have to pull it open and push close from the top edge rather than using the handle. Fired it up right away and it has an impressive heat output. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: OChousewife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this unit to use on our back porch. It took about 15 minutes to assemble with very understandable directions. We love this unit. The only change we did was as we do not care for lava rocks bought dragon glass rocks on Amazon to use instead.
customer_reviews.author: TheKase

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit! This was extremely easy to put together, the directions were straightforward and easy to follow. It looks amazing and functions beautifully. Some reviewers mentioned that they needed to use a separate lighter to ignite the flame but I have not had that issue. You just need to make sure the gas is turned up enough and the igniter switch worked perfectly. The heat output is quite nice and effective and there is a nice amount of space for setting a glass or plate but I would still recommend having other outdoor side table later on hand to support those items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amarie
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and put it together it took over 2 hours to put it together because there's no numbers there's no letters on any of the legs the top part the back nothing you have to really pay attention when you put it together but other than that it seems to be doing OK just wish that they would label the legs in alphabetical order so you know which is 1st and it wouldn't take so long the put together
customer_reviews.author: amarie

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase...
customer_reviews.text: The table took less than an hour to assemble. The size, the heat output, and sturdiness of the table...very happy. My only complaint is that all four legs have paint missing on the corners. Its cosmetic, but disappointing. Like buying a car and having a scratch on the side. I would recommend this table to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Solid item, puts out lots of heat even in a stiff wind. Just received it so no idea how it holds up long term but it seems well made. It could have been manufactured better for assembly (some screws go in areas with very little room to work versus the other side) but no wobble, holes generally lined up as long as you wait to tighten until the end. It lit second try after assembly. It’s decently heavy, having a helper isn’t a bad idea. Very nice item, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Gelb

customer_reviews.title: Good firepit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine sturdy firepit that does its job, for the most part. After assembly (took an hour by myself), I could not get the starter to ignite the gas. This was even after adjusting the gap to around 3mm. So it is kinda annoying to have to manually light this every time. In addition, the unit is inefficient when it is turned full blast, I do not recommend that, but luckily at the lowest setting it is more than adequate for warming a small area. Overall not quite perfect but it gets its job done.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great but don’t put in too many rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many, we found the fire pit would not hold a flame. Unfortunately, we had not put it together when we got it and we were well outside the return window. In trying to troubleshoot, we removed some of the rocks. Voila! Now it works absolutely perfectly and it is so attractive. We love it and would recommend. Also hope our trick might solve problems for others. As an aside, OW Lee has glass rocks that are deeply discounted and look great with this pit. Just don’t buy too many. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was reluctant to get it but he loves it too. Surprisingly easy and quick to assemble. It took approximately a 1/2 hr. By myself. It is good quality.This was a great way to get a fire pit on our wood deck! The fire itself isn't as warm as an open wood burning pit would be, but the flame level is adjustable and the tank is nicely hidden underneath. The flame comes up immediately and burns consistently.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Igniter not working
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy enough but no spark from igniter. Have to use long nose butane lighter to light propane. Should not have to do this right from box. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tugnutt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my deck
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit, was easy to put together only needed a philps head screwdriver , added fire glass which looks way better than lava rocks, easy to use, nice flame, great addition to my deck
customer_reviews.author: E. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good fire pit so far...
customer_reviews.text: Good fire pit so far. Easy enough to assemble, did it on my own in about 30 - 40 minutes. Looks great assembled, perfect size for medium size deck. I've had a few problems igniting after about 3 weeks of use. It has always worked after a few tries, just a little worried about the longevity. I will update in a few weeks to months if there are any changes. But so far, I'm happy with the fire pit - just hope the igniter lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We were only able to use this fire pit one time without having issues. It’s only been 3 months (2 uses) and the igniter doesn’t ignite and gas regulator doesn’t stay down to release the gas so we have to keep it duct taped down... so disappointing. Would return if I could but missed the deadline. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day before a camping trip. Figured we’d throw it on the truck and take it with us!!! Assembled at campsite with just a Phillips head screw driver. Took about an hour. Had a couple small blemishes on the top. Turned out we were missing 2 pieces that hold the tank assembly. No biggie we could still use the fire pit. I called customer service, call was answered in less than 30 seconds by a US based person!!! Part is on the way!! Puts out good heat! And is nice not to have smoky clothes!! Might bring this every camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marrocco

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very easy, but when we turned the fire pit right side up we discovered that it had 2 very obvious dents on the table top ((shipping hazard)). Sen was a great customer service rep and was very accommodating. I was very surprised that he offered to send me a new pit without having to return the damaged one. If I could give this company 10 stars, I most certainly would!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10 pound bag of 1/4 inch fire glass separately because it’s super pretty. I love it. It was easy to put together, the instruction manual was easy to follow, probably easier with two people but I got it done. All you need is a Phillips screwdriver. It comes with the rest. It lit after a few attempts but that’s with any thing. Just have to hold down the knob and wait for it to light. My grill is sometimes the same way. I love it and can’t wait to use it more. The only thing I didn’t like was how long it took to get here but that was expected from the start.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Tip: if your ignition doesn’t work at first...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - seems like the glass wasn't the problem. The flame doesn't stay lit and we don't know why?!?! Just wanted to put a quick review for anyone that has the same problem we did... We couldn’t get the flame to stay lit. Followed all troubleshooting tips about the ignition. Well, it turned out that we just had too much glass in there. I bought 20 pounds of glass but that was too heavy so for anyone having the same problem, if you bought extra rocks or glass, try taking some off. Wish we would have known that! Now it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Scratches, everywhere.  Looks orange or reddish.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to show off. To have it in my beautiful backyard as an accent piece and to provide warmth. We live in Florida so we have not assembled it until today. Unfortunately after assembly I noticed the door is super tight and hits whenever it opens or closes. And I noticed it was scratched up everywhere. You need a mask when opening this box of lava rocks that have so much dust. Not nearly enough rocks to cover this big opening. I will reach out to the company and see what the status is and what they can do for me. I will update once it's done
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and no support
customer_reviews.text: I assembled as directed however the unit will not lite. I can see the ignitor spark and occassionally when attempting to start it there is a quick flash of gas ignition but it never stays lit. I contacted TACKLIFE at 347-307-8957 and a man told me I would get an email to help resolve the issue but I have not gotten anything. Now when I call that number again it goes directly to voice mail however the voice mailbox is full. Does not work, no support. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solid firetable with easy ignition, could have more lava rocks
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be solid with easy ignition, however it didn't come with enough lava rocks to cover the burner. This table is definitely larger than we expected, but we have been happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to get due to everything going on but it was worth the wait! I put it together without my husband and figured it out fine. The heat output is perfect for cool summer nights! I purchased the blue lava rocks from Walmart and they make it look so much nicer! I love it and for the price think it’s super nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryblynnh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few different fire pits over the years and right off I believe this to be better made and of higher quality than others in or even above this price range. Easy to assemble with extra bolts included (nice touch) and despite taking my time it took well less than an hour. I definitely believe this is great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It was super easy to assemble and emits a powerful flame. Provides great warmth and a place to roast marshmallows. I love how easy it is to start and turn off. Looks great when not in use, too! It comes with volcano rocks, but I think I’m going to buy colored glass to make it look even prettier.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t light!!  Tacklife NOT available!!
customer_reviews.text: Spent all morning putting it together. It looks fine... but... it won’t light!!! Phone number on website is out of service. Phone on instruction manual is Monday through Friday so no fire this weekend!! Hopefully can get help Monday. So far, we are disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. P

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged. No damage. Instructions are very well drawn out and all parts are labeled. A Phillips screwdriver and 35 minutes and I had mine up and running. They even include spare machine screws. Well made and sturdy. Couldn't be happier. A bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: NealOh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to assemble (and this is from two people that have issues assembling everything lol), we did scratch the top because we should have had a blanket under it when attaching the legs. It seems pretty sturdy and after a bit of trial and error we figured out the trick to lighting it. If we encounter problems down the road I’ll update this but for now it seems pretty fantastic! Just waiting for a cool night now so we can enjoy that fire 🔥
customer_reviews.author: Halycon

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with great service
customer_reviews.text: Contradictory to some other reviews; the instruction manual was very clear, assembly was easy, & the edges weren't sharp. I did experience some difficulty with the ignitor and there was a small dent/scratch on the table; however their service team promptly solved these issues for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: High Flames Are Possible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my deck so that my friends could continue to come over and stay warm even in the colder weather. They really love it, and it creates a nice ambiance. The height of the flames can get high. Assembly was a little trickly, but not too bad. Will be purchasing a cover to protect it from rain and snow. Have purchased a fire blanket to extinquish any flames, just in case someone gets too close. Be sure not to place drinks on the rim when it is lit. They will get too hot quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkies

customer_reviews.title: Good pit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great fire pit for the price. I am not very handy and I was able to put it together by myself without an issue. Although, I do think it’s a little optimistic to see it only takes 30 minutes to do so. The only complaint I have is on the very first time I tried to start it, it would not start. After watching many videos and pursuing the Q and A portion of the reviews, I ultimately had to use a lighter to get the fire pit started the first time. But only the first time. It has lit up immediately in every subsequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs77

customer_reviews.title: The fire pit is a dud.
customer_reviews.text: It does not ignite. The company sent me a new igniter which was very difficult to install. It still does not ignite. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Edward R Condon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful hot fire with excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with gouge and ignitor didn't work. They quickly made things right, going above and beyond my expectations. I had room sl smaller than bedroom. Temp was 36deg and 10min later it was 60deg. Only item I could find to put out this much heat this quickly. Very sturdy with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: C. J

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Nice fire pit. Easy to light and looks really good on my deck. The only draw back. It does not come with locking wheels. It would be a lot easier to roll around or just move to situate. The legs come with threads but I cannot find wheels to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble; Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in a while I assembled a product that had all the pieces. It was very easy to assemble. All the pieces lined up. I didn't have to drill any new holes or bend anything due to holes being in the wrong places. The fire pit is just as easy to use. As far as heat output, there is a lot of heat depending on the setting, but as a late uncle would say "You can't heat the outside. God won't let you." You can warm your hands and if you sit close enough your face.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Daly

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and cozy
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit is really Nice looking and the size is perfect for my patio. We bought this in our heat wave so I only tried it two times. But it lights up easily and throws a good amount of heat. I’m sure for our cooler nights to come it will be amazing. Very happy with the purchase. I will be buying some glass stones just to add a little more ambiance. I did buy the cover to protect from the weather and that is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a bad pilot/super hard to light
customer_reviews.text: It’s very hard to light this! I think there’s something wrong with the pilot on ours. You have to mess with it so much and use a lighter and even still it hardly ever lights. It did great for about 3 fires and then this happened. So, not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Took over a month to even get this. When it arrived it as a hassle to turn on. Had to amp up the gas all the way. Used it twice for a short period of time. On the third attempt it wouldn’t even turn on anymore. Just pumps gas to the air. Hassle to get. And just didn’t work at all now. Very disappointed to have wasted a few hundred dollars for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to deck
customer_reviews.text: Love sitting around fire pit but hate the pain of gathering wood and cleanup after. I also want to be able to put up on wood deck. This has been great so far. Easy to lite and the flames look great. When on high, there is a faint hiss of gas. I miss the crackle and smell of real wood, but the convenience can't be beat. Looking forward to spending time outside now that it's gotten cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Miller

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, looks great, but a lot of parts
customer_reviews.text: It came in A LOT of pieces and it took some brainpower to assemble but once we had it put together it was sturdy and it looks great on the patio! It hasn’t rusted or shown any sign of wear. It seems to be durable but I wish it would have included more lava rocks. We will probably end up buying more to cover up some of the metal gas pipes. Also, the metal frame stays cool which is great when you have kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Outsen

customer_reviews.title: Typical Chinese product.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got a dud. Typical Chinese crap. Wrong parts and its wobbly. One of the side panels is missing the cutout for the propane knob. I assembled it without that panel. Once I got it put together and turned it over, the whole thing wobbles. There's screw inserts on the bottom of each corner for what I suspect are for leveling feet, but none are included. I'd return it if it wasn't so heavy. Oh well. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Lighting was a bit tricky handling the control knob on the fire pit. Initially when I pushed the knob in and turned to maximum it would start and shut off after a few seconds. After several try’s and holding the knob all the way in the fire started and you could hear the propane actually feeding the flame. After a number of seconds I slowly turned the knob to minimum and the flame was more than enough to appreciate and boy does it throw the heat and that’s at minimum! What’s most important is the wife likes it and all married men know a happy wife makes a happy life!
customer_reviews.author: donald zombo

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied . If propane regulator hose goes bad you will never find a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble and dented. I tried everything and won’t light . The regulator hose was bad and uses 1/4 pipe fitting and usa uses 3/8 hose connector. If you regulator ever goes bad you will have to throw unit away or buy another. I went to 3 Plummer supply stores and propane store. I had back and forth emails for weeks to figure this out with no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok takes forever to get it to light every time. For the price point It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very tricky to get the fire to come on. Every time I try it just clicks. I tried the directions it came with same problem. Be careful I had it on lowest flame bit it shot up at me. That’s one thing I wish was better. It takes 10 minutes just to get it to come on. It is very frustrating. I guess for the price it’s ok. I don’t see it lasting very long. I could be wrong. I would just research a couple other options.
customer_reviews.author: Cle0350

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a fire-pit, I decided to go with this one, the price was what I budgeted for. It was easy to assemble and the look was exactly as pictured. The size was perfect for the space, even a little larger than I thought. I added half of the rocks that came with it and poured a 10 lbs or glass rocks on top to give it the look I desired. If you are not going to use the lava rocks, you will need two bags of glass rocks to fill it up. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any outdoor patio or gazebo!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and I must say I was not pleased to begin with. I have since changed my mind. This is a Great Addition to your Patio, Gazebo, or any outdoor area. We have this on our patio, this item has made it so we spend a lot more time outside Whether it is a summer evening or a cool autumn night. The adjustable flame allows for comfort for whomever needs it. The ambiance from the flame is awesome. Propane bottle hides within the cabinet below the flame ring. Comes with the lava rock and a lid. Easy to clean and maintain. I love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this purchase. It took over a month to receive. When you push in the ignite knob, the fire will start, however when you let the pressure off of the knob the fire goes out. If there were negative stars to choose I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to have included information, or at least dimensions on castors to put it on wheels. Holes were predrilled for a 6 mm screw but I had to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smore's Anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday. With the Covid 19 pandemic, i wanted something for them to enjoy at home. The family loves it. Great for just sitting outdoors at night and perfect for making smores like camping. The price was just right for the product. You need to make assembly a little easier. He said it took about 2.5 hours to assemble. End result was worth it. THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.author: Char Roberts

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: It won't light, wire is exposed and frayed coming from the firebowl. I emailed and sent pictures as requested and have not heard back regarding a replacement part. Very upset for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Teuber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, poor heat output
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to put together and looks like high quality. Unfortunately the heat output is very low. Might be good for a screened in porch with curtains but do not expect it to keep you warm on even a mild October evening. More for the ambiance, not meant to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H.

customer_reviews.title: It sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: Was VERY disappointed!! One of the screw holes was faulty so we had to rig it to make it work for the legs. And then the damn thing didn't want to start!!!! Come to found out one of the connections was bad!! Really sucks when I wait for over two months to get the product ( when come to found out I could have bought it in the stores cheaper) and it doesn't work. I would rate the product in the negatives!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; non functioning fire ring.
customer_reviews.text: Many of the screw holes were misaligned. When we finally got it together ( it took 2 hours due to the Misaligned holes), we attached to propane tank only to find that the ring ignited, but it would not stay on. Looks like there are many other people with ignition problems as well. Poor quality control and poor response from the seller. 2 phone calls, three hours apart and no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and even worse customer service. Still waiting on parts from manufacturer. I cancelled my previous request for a return when they promised me the parts...a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Decent Propane Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase overall, but it does have some issues. One pre-drilled hole is out of alignment enough that we were unable to get the final screw in correctly - it doesn't really affect usability, just annoying. Also, as other reviewers have mentioned, the igniter sucks. We got it to work the very first time but have had to use a lighter to manually light it every time since. Again, not a major issue but not ideal. It doesn't put out a ton of heat, but I didn't expect it to with it being propane. Overall, it works just fine - you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wolfman

customer_reviews.title: EASY
customer_reviews.text: My kids always would ask me to have a fire. I’d go cut up some wood mess around with starting it. Getting it up to where I can sit down and everybody’s over it and wants to go in. I love this thing I turn a knob and it’s lit.... three mins later when they want to do something else I turn it off and walk away. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tiny bit janky to put together. I recommend two people because you’ve got to sort of manhandle it to get it to line up. Really pleased with the finished product tho. This is the older style, by the way. And we layered fire glass on top of the lava rock it came with for a different effect.
customer_reviews.author: Achilyse

customer_reviews.title: Dial plate defective
customer_reviews.text: The Tacklife firepit works ok but the item arrived defective. The Dial plate was bent and did not lay flat on the side of the fire pit. I'm reaching out to the company to see what can be done to resolve the issue. Since I'm having problems sending them pictures, I'm posting it on the review so the pictures are easily accessible. Edit: customer service resolved the issue. Adjusting Star to match experience
customer_reviews.author: Kittie L.

customer_reviews.title: A Fire pit that lights when it wants to
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our lake house and did not get to use it right away, now I go last week end and we tried to use for the first time and we have a problem with trying to light, now its to late to return. You need to turn the auto start on about 10 times to light if you are lucky, or just get a match and when you get it lit you need to play with the pressure dial to keep it going. It looks like it needs a new igniter and pressure dial assembly. So what do I do now ?
customer_reviews.author: Rick Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Won't light
customer_reviews.text: Ring ignites but will not stay on. Tried two different propane tanks. Removed stones and still the same. Phone number on instruction manual is not in service. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire pit/table!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit/table is awesome! It puts off a good amount of heat, and a decent sized flame. I like that you can use it as a table as well, and it’s very sturdy. The only negative thing I can say is that it can be extremely fickle. You have to be very precise with how you turn the knob to spark the flame otherwise you’ll just smell the propane coming out and have to wait a minute or two to try it again. Either way, awesome product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style and love it when it works but every time I want to use it I have to unplug the electrodo. That is annoying. Also when I was putting it together there was a Side I could Only attached with one screw because the others didn’t get in the space for it. A little frustrating, I have it for a week now and I am giving it a second week before I contact seller for options
customer_reviews.author: Magda Holliday

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy this firepit!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have really enjoyed our firepit. To me, it does look somewhat cheaply made but you get what you pay for and it wasn't a super expensive firepit. It is very convenient and easy to use and we love sitting on our back deck around the fire! It doesn't put off tons of heat but it's still nice. We love to roast marshmallows over the fire with our kids!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, perfect size, attractive. A no mess alternative to a traditional campfire while still delivering that campfire feel. Kids started making smores on it within minutes. Bought a cover for it so hoping to have it in use for several years.
customer_reviews.author: NoDunkOnMe

customer_reviews.title: Great unit at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile longer to arrive than I expected, but the unit was securely packaged and arrived with no dents or scratches. It was fairly easy to assemble with good directions, pictures, and all necessary parts. You only need a phillips head screwdriver. The unit has a nice adjustable flame and is really a great addition to our patio. This is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NJB

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality item
customer_reviews.text: The striker does not work. We have to use a hand held striker. The only reason we kept the item is because we were having a party this weekend and needed the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s well worth the price. Had no issues putting together. Flame is a great height and adjustable. Using in high 70’s temp so not sure of heat output but can’t imagine it will give off great heat in the winter. Perfect for spring, summer & fall. Great ambience. Quick and clean when not wanting to blaze up the huge fire pit we have. Also great for decks and close spaces. Will definitely change the rocks for glass. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lammy

product_meta.title: Propane Fire Pit Table, TACKLIFE Outdoor Companion, 28 Inch 50,000 BTU Auto-Ignition Gas Fire Pit Table with Cover, CSA Certification and Strong Striped Steel Surface, Table in Summer, Stove in Winter
feature_bullets: 🏆【 Safe & Warm Bonfire Experience】 - Tacklife 28 inch outdoor fire table is CSA certified, Use propane fuel to provide stable and green burning, so you no longer suffer from ash and smog; The heat output is 50,000 BTU, providing ample warmth and creating a warm and romantic bonfire atmosphere

🏆【 Multi-function Fire Pit & Fashion Appearance】 - When not burning with a fire pit, cover the lid provided, It can be easily converted into an outdoor dining table, coffee table, or casual bar, for more functional experience, fashion appearance corresponds to your garden, courtyard, terrace, balcony

🏆【 Durable Materials & Quality Assurance】 - The gas outdoor fire table is made of sturdy steel to prevent cracking and damaging the table surface; The burner and control panel are made of stainless steel for a longer working life; Ignition device for easy adjustment of flame and simple switch control

🏆【 Unique Craftsmanship & Design】 - The tabletop of natural gas fire table uses multiple processes to spray rust-proof black paint, Bottom steel panel for wicker look, The combination of the two looks very elegant, Unique antique copper art finishes, Easy to move

🏆【 What You Get】 - TACKLIFE GFP01 Fire Table, Square Cover, 20 Inch Gas Hose, Lava stone, Product Manual, Warranty Card Table Size : L28" x W28"x H25" , In order to create a beautiful time for you and your family or friends, We promise TACKLIFE fire pit to provide 24 months warranty and professional friendly after-sales service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,694 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
